scripts.deployDevEthBridge: cross-env NETWORK=deveth npx hardhat run scripts/bridge.js --network cheapeth
scripts.startBridge: cross-env NETWORK=deveth BRIDGE=0x3CcC5f31fE08abED579F7D0a3BffacDEe95f9534 hardhat run scripts/bridge.js --network cheapeth
scripts.claim-wdTH: cross-env NETWORK=deveth BRIDGE=0x3CcC5f31fE08abED579F7D0a3BffacDEe95f9534 hardhat run scripts/wrappeddth.js --network cheapeth
scripts.start-dth-bridge: cross-env NETWORK=deveth BRIDGE=0x3CcC5f31fE08abED579F7D0a3BffacDEe95f9534 hardhat run scripts/bridge.js --network cheapeth
scripts.start-bsc-bridge: cross-env NETWORK=binance BRIDGE=0x5d9F3F1441b0f4f127D5e8D7d39f68638E26d8b8 hardhat run scripts/bridge.js --network cheapeth
scripts.start-eth-bridge: cross-env NETWORK=mainnet BRIDGE=0x42ba482C89662d667cF9664802cE34DABbFB1375 hardhat run scripts/bridge.js --network cheapeth
